content:
Hey, I've noticed that some crates in our Cargo.toml files are outdated. One indirect dependency is also flagged by cargo-audit. What is the best way to update them? Should I create a PR in our rust-clippy repo, or is it better to do such updates in the rust repo and have them synced back?

The changes are in clippy_lints:

  • semver = "0.11" -> "1.0"
  • cargo_metadata = "0.12" -> "0.14"

Rather do them in the Rust repository, to make sure not to get too many duplicated dependencies in the Cargo.lock of the rust-lang/rust repo.

Recently someone cleaned up and updated most of our deps, but those two were left out, because of the duplication in the Cargo.lock.
kudos for using rustsec :octopus:
